title: rclone Keeps Failing to Copy File with "corrupted on transfer" (local->crypt->mount)

milestone.title: v1.58
milestone.description:
Due date shifted 16.01.2022 -> 28.02.2022 by @ivandeex on 13.01.2022
cc @ncw

body:
<!--

Welcome :-) We understand you are having a problem with rclone; we want to help you with that!

If you've just got a question or aren't sure if you've found a bug then please use the rclone forum:

    https://forum.rclone.org/

instead of filing an issue for a quick response.

If you think you might have found a bug, please can you try to replicate it with the latest beta?

    https://beta.rclone.org/
    
If you can still replicate it with the latest beta, then please fill in the info below which makes our lives much easier.  A log with -vv will make our day :-)

Thank you

The Rclone Developers

-->

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?
Than I crypt local folder and mount it on windows 10, i get this massage:
[log.txt](https://github.com/rclone/rclone/files/4279999/log.txt)

"ERROR : IO error: failed to transfer file from cache to remote: corrupted on transfer: MD5 crypted hash differ "cd60ea4dd2e9e81e702bc637df404751" vs "35f640a1fd3ae61ad81581496f86a60b"


#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)
rclone v1.51.0
- os/arch: windows/amd64
- go version: go1.13.7


#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)
Windows 10 64bit


####  Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)
Local


#### The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
.\rclone mount lo_crpt: p:  --vfs-cache-mode writes

[lo_crpt]
type = crypt
remote = e:\\iokpb_cr\\
filename_encryption = off
directory_name_encryption = false
password = *** ENCRYPTED ***
password2 = *** ENCRYPTED ***

Then i make text file in note and save and get error,
without key --vfs-cache-mode the system is work, but i can not edit the file

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

The service rclone has been started.
2020/03/03 16:04:49 ERROR : kjdfhgjdfkdfk.txt: Failed to copy: corrupted on transfer: MD5 crypted hash differ "7cfd006a83f095b44dc1a4ea0ed75da4" vs "b077f73d494a4d595a490dedc46ae797"
2020/03/03 16:04:49 ERROR : kjdfhgjdfkdfk.txt(0xc000112480): failed to transfer file from cache to remote: corrupted on transfer: MD5 crypted hash differ "7cfd006a83f095b44dc1a4ea0ed75da4" vs "b077f73d494a4d595a490dedc46ae797"
2020/03/03 16:04:49 ERROR : kjdfhgjdfkdfk.txt(0xc000112480): RWFileHandle.Flush error: failed to transfer file from cache to remote: corrupted on transfer: MD5 crypted hash differ "7cfd006a83f095b44dc1a4ea0ed75da4" vs "b077f73d494a4d595a490dedc46ae797"
2020/03/03 16:04:49 ERROR : IO error: failed to transfer file from cache to remote: corrupted on transfer: MD5 crypted hash differ "7cfd006a83f095b44dc1a4ea0ed75da4" vs "b077f73d494a4d595a490dedc46ae797"
